"Grad": "Hey! You look like someone who can handle themself."
"I could use your help with something! There's a reward in it for you, of course!"

"Oh, I see...
I'm not going anywhere, so if you change your mind, come on back."
"Hey! Did you bring the Ore?"
"Hand over the 5 Monotites"
"Return"
"Alright, this looks like all of them. Thanks a lot!"

"Hmm, this might not be enough...
Could you pick me up a few more?"
"Oh, I see. I'll be waiting right here when you do!"
"Well, you've really helped me out here. This should be plenty to be getting on with."
"...Ah, almost forgot! This is your reward. Here, take it."
"I'm sure you'll find it useful. Put it to use however you like."
"If you run into any problems yourself, feel free to bring them to me. I'm always happy to lend a hand."
"Aha, perfect timing!"
"I could use your help again. Up to hearing me out?"

"Oh, I see...
I'm not going anywhere, so if you change your mind, come on back."
"Eh? You've got the Ore?"
"Hand over the 5 Dualomites"
"Return"
"Alright, this looks like all of them. Thanks a lot!"

"Hmm, this might not be enough...
Could you pick me up a few more?"
"Oh, I see. I'll be waiting right here when you do!"
"Alright, looks good! I shouldn't have any trouble upgrading my weapons with this stuff."
"You've helped me out of another tight spot. I knew you were the right one to ask."
"Right, I've got another reward for you. Feast your eyes on this."
"I might have some more work for you soon. And another reward, of course!"
"You always know just when to show up!"
"I need you to go pick up some Ore for me again. Got a minute?"

"Oh, I see...
I'm not going anywhere, so if you change your mind, come on back."
"Eh? You've got the Ore?"
"Hand over the 5 Trinites"
"Return"
"Alright, this looks like all of them. Thanks a lot!"

"Hmm, this might not be enough...
Could you pick me up a few more?"
"Oh, I see. I'll be waiting right here when you do!"
"Alright, now I can get back to work! I'll be finished in no time!"
"I'm deeply indebted to you. I can't thank you enough!"
"Ah, before I forget, your reward. Go on, take it."
"You're just about as skilled as I've ever seen."
"Having ARKS like you around is a great comfort. I hope we get another chance to work together!"
